name: oh my giraffe (itch)
description:
This is a free desktop preview of oh my giraffe, available on the App Store, Google Play and the Amazon Appstore. If you like it and have mini-computers with touch screens, please consider buying the mobile version!

Eat fruits while being chased by lions. Cut the vines to send fruit plummeting onto the lions. Don't worry, your flexible neck will let you reach everything. You'll be great. And remember: the lions sleep at night. That's your chance to gobble down as many fruits as possible.

“Refreshingly simple, lovingly crafted" – Pat Kemp
“Quirky, fun, highly recommended" – Alex Schearer

Features:
– really long necks
– off-the-hook wipeouts
– big scary cats
– gripping combo system
– peaceful evenings
– day-night cycle
